description.value:
Scout chk'tu are slimmer chk'tu born with six wings instead of the usual four that warrior chk'tu are born with. A scout chk'tu's wings also come with a larger wingspan that allows them to fly without landing so long as the chk'tu has the energy to do so. They also uniquely have a set of antennae that are highly sensitive to the scents of flora.
    These flying chk'tu are often given roles as scouts, foragers, and air support, as well as territory guards, messengers, and hunters.

system.classDetails:
Scout Chk'tu Traits

  • Compatibility: Insectoid
  • Attribute Increase: Your Dexterity increases by 2.
  • Slow Walker: Your base walking speed is 20ft instead.
  • Flight: You have a flying speed of 25ft. To use this speed, you cannot be wearing medium or heavy armor.
  • Olfactory Antennae: @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.PX53DTW4FKMESH8I]{Olfactory Antennae}
